author: Microsoft
description:
#management #managertips #manager #microsoft 

Discover how managers can harness the power of AI agents to sharpen their competitive edge. Pascal Bornet explains why the best results come when humans and agents have distinct roles—humans drive core values and emotional intelligence, while agents handle research, routine tasks, and coordination. Learn how management is shifting from task assignment to orchestrating human-agent workflows, setting goals, and defining boundaries for success.

title: The AI hack managers should know
